data.author: Kleppten

changelog.release_notes:
BankFinder shows you the direction, distance and address of banks in a 1km square around your current position. It relies on Open Street Map data. So if you can't find any banks or find incorrect data, please go to OSM and correct this for you and future users. 

Thank you. Keep information free for us all. Donate to Open Street Map.
http://donate.openstreetmap.org/

data.description:
BankFinder shows you the direction, distance and street address of the nearest banks within a square km around your current position. It relies on Open Street Map Data. So if you find insufficient or incorrect information please go to openstreetmap.org to correct this for you and future users.

Please help to keep public location data free and donate to http://donate.openstreetmap.org/

It is still experimental, so no guarantees for unnessary walking around. Please give feedback, how it works in your area.
